<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         
         <module code="CustomInvoiceXmlModule" license="GPL" description="Custom Invoice Xml Module">          
            
            <moduleItems>

               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.InvoiceXmlScript" description="Custom Invoice Xml Script">
                  
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.io.File;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.math.RoundingMode;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Provider;
import org.meveo.model.admin.Seller;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.ProviderService;
import org.meveo.model.ICustomFieldEntity;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Invoice;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.XMLInvoiceCreator;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.w3c.dom.Document;
import org.w3c.dom.Element;
import org.w3c.dom.Node;
import org.w3c.dom.Text;

/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Generate custom Xml Invoice
 * 
 *         Execute Context Variable : 
 *         <li>CONTEXT_ENTITY : the invoice
 *         <li>isVirtual : invoicing mode
 *         <li>XMLInvoiceCreator : XMLInvoiceCreator std service
 * 
 * Object: [SCN]
 *   + Add Provider CF
 *   + Add Seller with CF
 */
public class InvoiceXmlScript extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(InvoiceXmlScript.class);
	private CustomFieldInstanceService cfiService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");
    private Provider provider = ((ProviderService)getServiceInterface("ProviderService")).getProvider();

	@Override
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {}", methodContext);
		try{
			XMLInvoiceCreator xmlInvoiceCreator = (XMLInvoiceCreator) methodContext.get("XMLInvoiceCreator");
			Invoice invoice = (Invoice) methodContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
          
            	Boolean isVirtual = (Boolean) methodContext.get("isVirtual");
			int rounding = provider.getRounding() == null ? 2 : provider.getRounding();

            	Document document = xmlInvoiceCreator.createDocument(invoice,isVirtual.booleanValue());

          	// Get CF lists
          	Element element = (Element)document.getElementsByTagName("provider").item(0);
			addCustomFields(provider, invoice, document, element);

			// Add seller
          	Seller seller = invoice.getBillingAccount().getCustomerAccount().getCustomer().getSeller();
          	Element invoiceTag = (Element)document.getElementsByTagName("header").item(0);
          	Element sellerTag = document.createElement("seller");
			sellerTag.setAttribute("code", seller.getCode());
			sellerTag.setAttribute("description", seller.getDescription());
			invoiceTag.appendChild(sellerTag);
			addCustomFields(seller, invoice, document, sellerTag);

           	File file = xmlInvoiceCreator.createFile(document,invoice);
			methodContext.put(Script.RESULT_VALUE, file);
		}catch(Exception e){
			throw new BusinessException(e.getMessage());
		}
	}
  
  	private String round(BigDecimal amount, Integer scale) {
		if (amount == null) {
			amount = BigDecimal.ZERO;
		}
		if (scale == null) {
			scale = 2;
		}
		amount = amount.setScale(scale, RoundingMode.HALF_UP);
		return amount.toPlainString();
	}	

	private void addCustomFields(ICustomFieldEntity entity, Invoice invoice, Document doc, Element parent) {
		if (provider.getInvoiceConfiguration() != null && provider.getInvoiceConfiguration().getDisplayCfAsXML() != null && provider.getInvoiceConfiguration().getDisplayCfAsXML()) {
			Element customFieldsTag = cfiService.getCFValuesAsDomElement(entity, doc);
			parent.appendChild(customFieldsTag);
		} else {
			String json = cfiService.getCFValuesAsJson(entity);
			if (json != null && json.length() > 0) {
				parent.setAttribute("customFields", json);
			}
		}
	}
}
]]></script>
                  <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->                
               </script>
                <customFieldTemplate code="PROV_CUSTOM_INV_XML_SCRIPT_CODE" description="Custom invoice XML Script code">
                  <fieldType>STRING</fieldType>                  
                  <appliesTo>PROVIDER</appliesTo>                 
                  <storageType>SINGLE</storageType>
                  <valueRequired>false</valueRequired>                             
                  <cacheValue>true</cacheValue>  
                  <guiPosition>tab:Custom Invoice:0;field:0</guiPosition>                
               </customFieldTemplate>               
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Suspend Subscriptions
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.SuspendSubscriptions" description="Suspends subscriptions at AO creation">
            
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;
import java.util.Map;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.JsonUtils;

import java.util.Date;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import org.meveo.model.payments.AccountOperation;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CustomerAccount;
import org.meveo.model.billing.BillingAccount;
import org.meveo.model.billing.UserAccount;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;

import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.CustomerAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.BillingAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.UserAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.billing.impl.SubscriptionService;

public class SuspendSubscriptions extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SuspendSubscriptions.class);

    public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {

        AccountOperation ao = (AccountOperation)initContext.get("event");
        if( ao.getOccCode().equals("CC_REJECT") ) {
            // browse BillingAccounts>UserAccounts, to get to the subscriptions
            int i = 0;

            CustomerAccountService caService =  (CustomerAccountService)getServiceInterface("CustomerAccountService");
            BillingAccountService baService =  (BillingAccountService)getServiceInterface("BillingAccountService");
            UserAccountService uaService =  (UserAccountService)getServiceInterface("UserAccountService");
            SubscriptionService suService =  (SubscriptionService)getServiceInterface("SubscriptionService");

              CustomerAccount ca = caService.refreshOrRetrieve(ao.getCustomerAccount());
            for( BillingAccount ba : ca.getBillingAccounts() )
            {
                ba = baService.refreshOrRetrieve(ba);
                for( UserAccount ua : ba.getUsersAccounts() )
                {
                    ua = uaService.refreshOrRetrieve(ua);
                    for( Subscription su : ua.getSubscriptions() )
                    {
                        suService.subscriptionSuspension(su, new Date());
                        log.debug("Suspending subscription " + su.getCode());
                        
                        i++;
                    }
                }
            }

            String result = "Suspended " + i
                + " subscriptions for Customer Account " + ao.getCustomerAccount().getCode() 
                + " (reason : " + ao.getOccCode() + " - " + ao.getOccDescription() + ")";
            log.info(result);
            initContext.put("result",result);
        }
        else {
            String result = "Nothing to do (wrong OCC code : " + ao.getOccCode() + ", CustomerAccount : " + ao.getCustomerAccount().getCode() + ")";
            log.info(result);
            initContext.put("result",result);
        }
    }
}
]]></script>\r
         </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
         </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.workflow;

import java.util.Arrays;
import java.util.List;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Customer;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomerCategoryService;
import org.meveo.service.script.wf.WFTypeScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class CustomerWF extends WFTypeScript<Customer> {

    @Override
    public List<String> getStatusList() {
        return Arrays.asList("NOUVEAU", "VALIDER_NIV2", "VALIDER_NIV3", "CLIENT");
    }

    @Override
    public String getActualStatus() {
        return entity.getCustomerCategory().getCode();
    }

    @Override
    public void changeStatus(String newStatus) {
            entity.setCustomerCategory(((CustomerCategoryService) getServiceInterface("CustomerCategoryService")).findByCode(newStatus,entity.getAuditable().getCreator().getProvider()));
    }
}
]]></script>\r
	</createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
   
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         
         <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.DunningWorkFlow" description="Dunning workflow">


            
            <type>JAVA</type>
            <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.Date;
import java.util.List;

import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CustomerAccount;
import org.meveo.model.payments.DunningLevelEnum;
import org.meveo.service.script.wf.WFTypeScript;


public class DunningWorkFlow extends WFTypeScript<CustomerAccount>{

 public DunningWorkFlow() {  
 }
 
 public DunningWorkFlow(CustomerAccount e) {
  super( e );
 }
 @Override
 public List<String> getStatusList() {  
  List<String> values = new ArrayList<String>();
  for (DunningLevelEnum dunningLevelEnum : DunningLevelEnum.values()) {
   values.add(dunningLevelEnum.name());
  }
  return values;
 }

 @Override
 public void changeStatus(String newStatus,User currentUser) {
  entity.setDunningLevel(DunningLevelEnum.valueOf(newStatus));
  entity.setDateDunningLevel(new Date());
 }

 @Override
 public String getActualStatus() {  
  return entity.getDunningLevel().name();
 }
}
]]></script>\r
	</createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
	</ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Customer Workflow Advance Script
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
   
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         
            <createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest code="org.meveo.service.script.CustWFAdvance" description="Avancement du WF Customer">
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script;

import java.util.List;
import java.util.Map;
import java.util.Iterator;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.ElementNotFoundException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.InvalidScriptException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Customer;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.meveo.service.wf.WorkflowService;
import org.meveo.model.wf.Workflow;
//import org.meveo.workflow.CustomerWF;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomerCategoryService;


public class CustWFAdvance extends org.meveo.service.script.Script {
	
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CustWFAdvance.class);
	ScriptInstanceService scriptInstanceService = (ScriptInstanceService)getServiceInterface("ScriptInstanceService");
	WorkflowService workflowService = (WorkflowService)getServiceInterface("WorkflowService");

	public void init(Map<String,Object> methodContext,User user) throws BusinessException{
	}
		
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext, User user) throws BusinessException {
      log.debug("Execute CustWFAdvance Script...");
	  Customer cust = (Customer) initContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
      String custCat = cust.getCustomerCategory().getCode();
	  String newCustCat = null;
      
      switch(custCat) {
      	case "NOUVEAU" : 
        	newCustCat = "VALIDER_NIV2";
        	break;
      	case "VALIDER_NIV2" : 
        	newCustCat = "VALIDER_NIV3";
        	break;
      	case "VALIDER_NIV3" : 
        	newCustCat = "CLIENT";
        	break;
        default: 
        	break;
      }
      
      if( newCustCat != null ){
            cust.setCustomerCategory(((CustomerCategoryService) getServiceInterface("CustomerCategoryService")).findByCode(newCustCat,user.getProvider()));
      }
        
        
      
/*      
      List<Workflow> workflows = (List<Workflow>) workflowService.getWorkflows(user.getProvider());
      
      boolean found = false;
      CustomerWF custWf = null;
      for (Workflow wf : workflows) {
        log.debug("Found Workflow : " + wf.getCode());
        if( wf.getCode().equals("WF_CREATE_CUSTOMER") ) {
          custWf = (CustomerWf)wf;
          break;
        }
	  }
      
      if( custWF == null ) {
	      log.warn("Workflow WF_CREATE_CUSTOMER not found");
      }
*/
	}

}
]]></script>
            </createOrUpdateScriptInstanceRequest>
	</ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateAction>
<entityAction code="BTN_CUST_WF_ADVANCE" description="Avancement du worfflow client" appliesTo="CUST"> <applicableOnEl>#{entity.customerCategory.code != "CLIENT"}</applicableOnEl> <label>Valider client</label> <script code="org.meveo.service.script.CustWFAdvance" /> </entityAction> </ws:createOrUpdateAction> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: TRG_COMMISSION_SRV
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateTriggeredEdr> <triggeredEdrTemplate code="TRG_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" description="EDR for commissioning"> <!-- <conditionEl>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(serviceInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_SELECTOR_TRIGGER_COMMISSION").equals("yes") }</conditionEl> --> <conditionEl>#{ false }</conditionEl> <subscriptionEl>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(serviceInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_PARTNER") }</subscriptionEl> <subscriptionElSpark>mv.getInheritedCFValue(ciRow, "si","CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_PARTNER")</subscriptionElSpark> <quantityEl>#{ op.amountWithoutTax }</quantityEl> <quantityElSpark>op.getAmount_without_tax(</quantityElSpark> <param1El>COMMISSION</param1El> <param1ElSpark>COMMISSION</param1ElSpark> <param2El>#{ ba.code }</param2El> <param2ElSpark>ciRow.getString(ciRow.fieldIndex("acet__code"))</param2ElSpark> <param3El>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(serviceInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_RATE") }</param3El> <param3ElSpark>mv.getInheritedCFValue(ciRow, "si","CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_RATE")</param3ElSpark> </triggeredEdrTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateTriggeredEdr> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: TRG_COMMISSION_PRD
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateTriggeredEdr> <triggeredEdrTemplate code="TRG_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" description="EDR for commissioning"> <conditionEl>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(productInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_SELECTOR_TRIGGER_COMMISSION").equals("yes") }</conditionEl> <subscriptionEl>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(productInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_PARTNER") }</subscriptionEl> <quantityEl>#{ op.amountWithoutTax }</quantityEl> <param1El>COMMISSION</param1El> <param2El>#{ ba.code }</param2El> <param3El>#{ mv:getInheritedCFValue(productInstance,"CF_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION_RATE") }</param3El> </triggeredEdrTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateTriggeredEdr> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: CH_REC_FLAT
con:request.con:request:

<recurringChargeTemplate code="CH_${#Project#templateCode}_REC_FLAT" description="Recurring flat fee (monthly, applied in advance, prorated)"> <invoiceSubCategory>${#Project#templateCode}_RECURRING</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <calendar>CAL_${#Project#templateCode}_MONTHLY_1ST</calendar> <subscriptionProrata>true</subscriptionProrata> <terminationProrata>true</terminationProrata> <applyInAdvance>true</applyInAdvance> <triggeredEdrs> <triggeredEdr code="TRG_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" /> </triggeredEdrs> </recurringChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateRecurringChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<recurringChargeTemplate code="CH_${#Project#templateCode}_REC_NO_PRORATA" description="Recurring flat fee (monthly, applied in advance, not prorated)"> <invoiceSubCategory>${#Project#templateCode}_RECURRING</invoiceSubCategory> <disabled>false</disabled> <calendar>CAL_${#Project#templateCode}_MONTHLY_1ST</calendar> <subscriptionProrata>false</subscriptionProrata> <terminationProrata>false</terminationProrata> <applyInAdvance>true</applyInAdvance> <triggeredEdrs> <triggeredEdr code="TRG_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" /> </triggeredEdrs> </recurringChargeTemplate> </ws:createOrUpdateRecurringChargeTemplate> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

<offerTemplate code="OF_${#Project#templateCode}_CLASSIC" description="${#Project#templateLabel} with multiple basic services"> <name>${#Project#templateLabel}</name> <disabled>true</disabled> code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_REC_FLAT" description="Recurring flat fee"/> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> <offerServiceTemplate> <serviceTemplate code="SE_REC_VOLUME" description="Recurring volume based fee"/> <mandatory>false</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> <offerServiceTemplate> <serviceTemplate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_USG_UNIT" description="Usage rated per unit"/> <mandatory>false</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> <offerServiceTemplate> <serviceTemplate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_USG_VOLUME_EVENT" description="Usage with event volume pricing"/> <mandatory>false</mandatory> </offerServiceTemplate> <offerServiceTemplate> <serviceTemplate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_USG_PLAN" description="Usage with plan"/> con:request.name: Create OF_SUPER_COMMISSION from BOM_COMMISSION
con:request.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOfferFromBOM>
<bomOffer bomCode="BOM_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" description="Super Commission for ${#Project#templateLabel}" name="Super Commission for ${#Project#templateLabel}" code="OF_${#Project#templateCode}_SUPER_COMMISSION"> <servicesToActivate> <serviceToActivate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_COMMISSION" description="Commissioning service"> <parameters/> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </serviceToActivate> </servicesToActivate> </bomOffer> </ws:createOfferFromBOM> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create OF_MAIN from BOM_TEMPLATE
con:request.con:request:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOfferFromBOM>
<bomOffer bomCode="BOM_${#Project#templateCode}_TEMPLATE" description="Super ${#Project#templateLabel} (subscription fee, recurring, usage)" name="Super ${#Project#templateLabel}" code="OF_${#Project#templateCode}_MAIN"> <servicesToActivate> <serviceToActivate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_REC_FLAT" description="Recurring fee"> <parameters> <parameter code="CF_${#Project#templateCode}_PRICE_REC"> <doubleValue>19.90</doubleValue> </parameter> <parameter code="CF_${#Project#templateCode}_SELECTOR_TRIGGER_COMMISSION"> <stringValue>yes</stringValue> </parameter> </parameters> <mandatory>true</mandatory> </serviceToActivate> <serviceToActivate code="SE_${#Project#templateCode}_USG_UNIT" description="Usage service"> <parameters> <parameter con:request.name: ForgotPasswordModule
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <module code="ForgotPasswordModule" license="GPL" description="Rest password">           
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword" description="ForgotPassword">
               
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.service.admin.impl.UserService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");
			
		} catch (ParseException e) {			
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}	   	      
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget);
	}
}
               ]]></script>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            </script>
            
            <moduleItems>
               <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 19 items at this level-->  
         <notification code="ForgotPasswordInReqNotif">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/${#Project#provider}/forgotPassword")}</elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>email</key>
                  <value>#{event.getBody()}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>	
			<emailNotif code="ForgotPasswordEmailNotif">
				<classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.admin.User</classNameFilter>
				<eventTypeFilter>UPDATED</eventTypeFilter>
				<emailFrom>bot@opencellsoft.com</emailFrom> 
				<subject>Password reset</subject>
				<emailToEl>#{event.email}</emailToEl>
				<elFilter>#{event.newPassword ne null}</elFilter>
				<body>Bonjour,
				Text modifiable
				user name  :  #{event.userName}
				password   :  #{event.newPassword}
				access url :  http://i.meveo.info/meveo/frontend/DEMO/index.html
				</body>
				</emailNotif>          
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: AddAccessModule
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <module code="AddAccessModule" license="GPL" description="AddAccessModule">           
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.CreateAccess" description="AddAccess">
               
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription;
import org.meveo.service.medina.impl.AccessService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class CreateAccess extends ModuleScript {	
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CreateAccess.class);		
	
	@Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
		AccessService accessService = (AccessService) getServiceInterface("AccessService");
		Subscription subscription = (Subscription) methodContext.get("subscription");
		if(subscription == null){
			throw new BusinessException("subscription is null");
		}
		log.debug("subscription.getCode() : "+subscription.getCode());		
		org.meveo.model.mediation.Access access = new org.meveo.model.mediation.Access();
		access.setSubscription(subscription);
		access.setAccessUserId("ACC_"+subscription.getCode());
		access.setStartDate(new Date());
		access.setEndDate(null);
		accessService.create(access);
    }	
}
               ]]></script>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            </script>
            
            <moduleItems>
            
               <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 19 items at this level-->  
         <notification code="AddAccessNotif">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.billing.Subscription</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>CREATED</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter></elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.CreateAccess</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>subscription</key>
                  <value>#{event}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>	       
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

		log.info("Execute...");
		AccountHierarchyApi accountHierarchyApi = (AccountHierarchyApi) getServiceInterface("AccountHierarchyApi");
		String body = (String) initContext.get("body");
		log.info("body:"+body);
		CRMAccountHierarchyDto crmAccountHierarchyDto = JsonUtils.toObject(body, CRMAccountHierarchyDto.class);

	}
}

package org.meveo.service.script;
import java.math.BigDecimal;
import java.nio.charset.Charset;

import org.meveo.api.dto.UserDto; 
import org.meveo.api.exception.MeveoApiException;
import org.meveo.commons.utils.StringUtils;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;    
import org.meveo.service.script.account.AccountScript;
import org.meveo.model.AccountEntity;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import java.util.Set;
import java.util.ArrayList;
import org.meveo.model.security.Role;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomerService;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.meveo.model.crm.Customer;
import org.meveo.service.crm.impl.CustomFieldInstanceService;
import org.meveo.api.UserApi;

public class SelfcareAccountScript extends AccountScript {

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SelfcareAccountScript.class);
	private Map<String, Object> initContext = null;

	static MessageDigest messageDigest = null;
	static {
		try {
			messageDigest = MessageDigest.getInstance("MD5");
		} 
		catch (NoSuchAlgorithmException e) {
		}
	}
	CustomFieldInstanceService customFieldInstanceService = (CustomFieldInstanceService) getServiceInterface("CustomFieldInstanceService");
	CustomerService customerService = (CustomerService) getServiceInterface("CustomerService");
	UserApi userApi = (UserApi) getServiceInterface("UserApi");

	@Override
	public void createAccount(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException { 
		AccountEntity account = (AccountEntity) methodContext.get(Script.CONTEXT_ENTITY);
		UserDto user = new UserDto();
		CRMAccountHierarchyDto accountDto = (CRMAccountHierarchyDto) methodContext.get(AccountScript.CONTEXT_ACCOUNT_HIERARCHY_DTO);
		Customer customer = customerService.findByCode(accountDto.getCode());

		log.debug("accountCode : "+accountDto.getCode(), " crmAccountType :"+accountDto.getCrmAccountType());
		  
		String email = accountDto.getContactInformation().getEmail(); 
		user.setEmail(email);
		if(accountDto.getName()!=null){
			user.setFirstName(accountDto.getName().getFirstName());
			user.setLastName(accountDto.getName().getLastName());
		}
		user.setUsername(accountDto.getCode());

		/*
		String password =(String) customFieldInstanceService.getCFValue(customer, "password");
		if( password != null )
		{
			user.setPassword(password);
		}
		else
		{
			log.warn("password CF is null, using username");
			user.setPassword(user.getUsername());
		}
		*/    

		List<String> roles = new ArrayList<String>();
		roles.add("selfcareDefault");
		user.setRoles(roles);
		log.debug("lastName :"+user.getLastName() + " firstName : "+user.getFirstName() + " email : "+user.getEmail());
		try{
			userApi.createOrUpdate(user);
		}
		catch(MeveoApiException e){
			log.error("failed to create user ",e); 
			e.printStackTrace();
		}
	}
}
]]>
			</script>

package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.service.admin.impl.UserService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");

		} catch (ParseException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget);
	}
}

con:request.name: ForgotPasswordModule
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <module code="ForgotPasswordModule" license="GPL" description="Rest password">
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword" description="ForgotPassword">
               
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.service.admin.impl.UserService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");

		} catch (ParseException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget);
	}
}
               ]]></script>
               <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->
            </script>
            
            <moduleItems>
               <!--You have a CHOICE of the next 19 items at this level-->
         <notification code="ForgotPasswordInReqNotif">
            <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
            <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>
            <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/${#Project#provider}/forgotPassword")}</elFilter>
            <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword</scriptInstanceCode>
            <scriptParams>
               <entry>
                  <key>email</key>
                  <value>#{event.getBody()}</value>
               </entry>
            </scriptParams>
         </notification>
			<emailNotif code="ForgotPasswordEmailNotif">
				<classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.admin.User</classNameFilter>
				<eventTypeFilter>UPDATED</eventTypeFilter>
				<emailFrom>bot@opencellsoft.com</emailFrom>
				<subject>Password reset</subject>
				<emailToEl>#{event.email}</emailToEl>
				<elFilter>#{event.newPassword ne null}</elFilter>
				<body>Bonjour,
				Text modifiable
				user name  :  #{event.userName}
				password   :  #{event.newPassword}
				access url :  http://i.meveo.info/meveo/frontend/DEMO/index.html
				</body>
				</emailNotif>
            </moduleItems>
         </module>
      </ws:createOrUpdate>
   </soapenv:Body>
</soapenv:Envelope>

<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">
   <soapenv:Header/>
   <soapenv:Body>
      <ws:createOrUpdate>
         <module code="ForgotPasswordModule" license="GPL" description="Rest password">
            <script code="org.meveo.service.script.selfcare.ForgotPassword" description="ForgotPassword">
               
               <type>JAVA</type>
               <script><![CDATA[
package org.meveo.service.script.selfcare;

import java.util.Map;
import java.util.UUID;

import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
import org.json.simple.parser.JSONParser;
import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.admin.User;
import org.meveo.service.admin.impl.UserService;
import org.meveo.service.script.module.ModuleScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

public class ForgotPassword extends ModuleScript{
	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(ForgotPassword.class);
	public void execute(Map<String, Object> initContext) throws BusinessException {
		log.debug("Execute...");
		UserService userService = (UserService) getServiceInterface("UserService");
		String emailRequest = (String) initContext.get("email");
		String emailValue = null;
		JSONParser parser = new JSONParser();
	    try {
			Object obj = parser.parse(emailRequest);
			JSONObject jsonObject = (JSONObject)obj;
			emailValue = (String) jsonObject.get("email");

		} catch (ParseException e) {
			throw new BusinessException("Cant parse request :"+e.getMessage());
		}
		log.debug("emailValue:" + emailValue);
		User userThatManyForget = userService.findByEmail(emailValue);
		if(userThatManyForget == null){
			throw new BusinessException("Cant find user "+emailValue);
		}
		String newPasswd = UUID.randomUUID().toString().substring(0, 7);
		log.debug("newPasswd:" + newPasswd);
		userThatManyForget.setNewPassword(newPasswd);
		userService.update(userThatManyForget);
	}
}

            <scriptParams>
               <entry>

con:request.name: BOM_TEST_CF
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOrUpdateBusinessOfferModel> <businessOfferModel code="BOM_TEST_CF" description="(BOM) Test CF on Service and Offer " license="GPL"> <offerTemplate code="OF_TEST_CF_TEMPLATE"/> </businessOfferModel> </ws:createOrUpdateBusinessOfferModel> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create OF_TEST_CF from BOM
con:request.con:request: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header /> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createOfferFromBOM> <bomOffer bomCode="BOM_TEST_CF" description="Test CF on Service and Offer" name="Test CF" code="OF_TEST_CF"> <parameters> <parameter code="CF_OFFER_PRICE_OS"> <doubleValue>2000</doubleValue> </parameter> </parameters> <servicesToActivate> <serviceToActivate code="SE_OSS_TEST_CF" description="One shots with prices on Service and Offer"> <parameters> <parameter code="CF_SERVICE_PRICE_OS"> <doubleValue>1000</doubleValue> </parameter> </parameters> </serviceToActivate> </servicesToActivate> </bomOffer> </ws:createOfferFromBOM> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create Customer
con:request.con:request:
\r \r \r \r \r Client\r ${#Project#templateCode}\r ${#TestSuite#CUST}\r ${#TestSuite#firstname} ${#TestSuite#lastname}\r 2017-01-01 \r MR\r ${#TestSuite#firstname}\r ${#TestSuite#lastname}\r \r
\r 14 rue Crespin du Gast\r 75011\r PARIS\r Paris Area FR\r
\r ${#TestSuite#CUST}@opencellsoft.com FRA\r CLIENT\r ${#Project#templateCode}\r EUR\r ${#TestSuite#billingCycle}\r FR\r true\r ${#TestSuite#CUST}@opencellsoft.com \r \r \r

con:request.name: Create Customer
con:request.con:request:
\r \r \r \r \r Client\r ${#Project#templateCode}\r ${#Project#SCUsername}\r ${#Project#SCFirstname} ${#Project#SCLastname}\r \r MR\r ${#Project#SCFirstname}\r ${#Project#SCLastname}\r \r
\r 14 rue Crespin du Gast\r 75011\r PARIS Paris Area FR\r
\r ${#Project#SCUsername}@opencellsoft.com FRA\r CLIENT\r ${#Project#templateCode}\r EUR\r BILLCYCLE1\r FR\r true\r FR 28552046955 ${#Project#SCUsername}@opencellsoft.com \r \r \r

con:request.name: Create Account Hierarchy
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateAccountHierarchy>\r <accountHierarchy> <usePrefix>true</usePrefix> <sellerCode>${#Project#provider}</sellerCode>\r <customerCode>${#TestSuite#CUST}_CAH_PREFIX</customerCode>\r <titleCode>MR</titleCode>\r <firstName>${#TestSuite#CUST}_CAH_PREFIX Firstname</firstName>\r <lastName>${#TestSuite#CUST}_CAH_PREFIX Lastname</lastName>\r <address1>14 rue Crespin du Gast</address1>\r <zipCode>75011</zipCode>\r <city>PARIS</city>\r <countryCode>FR</countryCode>\r <email>${#TestSuite#CUST}@opencellsoft.com</email> <languageCode>FRA</languageCode>\r <paymentMethod>0</paymentMethod>\r <customerCategoryCode>CLIENT</customerCategoryCode>\r <customerBrandCode>${#Project#provider}</customerBrandCode>\r <currencyCode>EUR</currencyCode>\r <billingCycleCode>BILLCYCLE1</billingCycleCode>\r <customFields> <customField code="password"> <stringValue>${#TestSuite#CUST}</stringValue> </customField> </customFields> </accountHierarchy>\r </ws:createOrUpdateAccountHierarchy>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Subscription
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r <subscription code="${#TestSuite#CUST}" description="${#TestSuite#CUST} Subscription to classic offer"> <userAccount>${#TestSuite#CUST}</userAccount> <offerTemplate>${#TestSuite#offerCode}</offerTemplate> <subscriptionDate>${#TestSuite#SUBSCRIPTION_DATE}</subscriptionDate> </subscription> </ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Subscription
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r <subscription code="${#TestSuite#CUST}_SUB2" description="${#TestSuite#CUST} Second subscription to classic offer"> <userAccount>${#TestSuite#CUST}</userAccount> <offerTemplate>${#TestSuite#offerCode}</offerTemplate> <subscriptionDate>${#TestSuite#SUBSCRIPTION_DATE}</subscriptionDate> </subscription> </ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r <subscription code="${#TestSuite#CUST}_SUB3" description="${#TestSuite#CUST} Third subscription to classic offer"> <userAccount>${#TestSuite#CUST}</userAccount> <offerTemplate>${#TestSuite#offerCode}</offerTemplate> <subscriptionDate>${#TestSuite#SUBSCRIPTION_DATE}</subscriptionDate> </subscription> </ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: New order
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r <subscription code="${#TestSuite#CUST}_SUB2" description="${#TestSuite#CUST} Second subscription to classic offer"> <userAccount>${#TestSuite#CUST}</userAccount> <offerTemplate>OF_${#Project#templateCode}_CLASSIC</offerTemplate> <subscriptionDate>${#TestSuite#SUBSCRIPTION_DATE}</subscriptionDate> </subscription> </ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Subscription

con:request.name: Create module
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
         <module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentModule" license="GPL" description="Custom gateway payment module">\r
            <moduleItems>\r
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript" description="CustomGatewayPaymentScript">\r
                  <type>JAVA</type>\r
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.smoove;

import java.io.StringReader;
import java.util.Map;

import javax.xml.xpath.XPath;
import javax.xml.xpath.XPathExpressionException;
import javax.xml.xpath.XPathFactory;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CardPaymentMethod;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.script.payment.PaymentScript;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
import org.xml.sax.InputSource;


public class ${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript extends PaymentScript{

	private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript.class);

	@Override
	public void createCardToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {			
		methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TOKEN, "7ced0000-3ab2-000d-6a50-08d4b8a6"+(int )(Math.random() * 1000 + 1));
	}

	@Override
    public void doPaymentToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
	    doIt(methodContext, "PAL");
	}  
	
	@Override
    public void doRefundToken(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
	    doIt(methodContext, "RFD");
    }
	
	
	
	private void doIt(Map<String, Object> methodContext,String operationType) throws BusinessException {
		try{
			log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
			Long amountCts = (Long)methodContext.get(PaymentScript.CONTEXT_AMOUNT_CTS);
			if(amountCts == null){
				throw new BusinessException("amountCts is null");
			}
			CardPaymentMethod paymentToken = (CardPaymentMethod)methodContext.get(PaymentScript.CONTEXT_TOKEN);
			if(paymentToken == null){
				throw new BusinessException("paymentMethod is null");
			}

			String body  = "{";
			body  += " \"PSPID\" : \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"USERID\" : \"USERID\" ,";
			body  += " \"PSWD\" : \"PSWD\" ,";
			body  += " \"REFKIND\" :  \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"REFID\" : \"PSPID\" ,";
			body  += " \"OPERATION\" : \""+operationType +"\" ,";
			body  += " \"AMOUNT\" : \""+amountCts.longValue()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"CURRENCY\" : \""+paymentToken.getCustomerAccount().getTradingCurrency().getCurrencyCode()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"TRANSACTIONID\" : \""+paymentToken.getTokenId()+"\" ,";
			body  += " \"SHASIGN\" : \"SHASIGN\" ,";
			body  += " }";
			log.debug("request body {} ", body);
/*			ApiExecutor apiExecutor = new ApiExecutor(); 
			HttpResponse httpResponse = apiExecutor.executeApi("/dl/maintenance", "https://ogone.test.v-psp.com", null, null,
					HttpMethodsEnum.POST,CommonContentTypeEnum.JSON, null, null,
					body, null, null); 
			if(httpResponse != null){
				int responseStatusCode =
						httpResponse.getStatusLine().getStatusCode(); 
				String paymentResponse = EntityUtils.toString(httpResponse.getEntity());
				if(responseStatusCode == 200 ){
					String paymentStatus = getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/STATUS");
					if("92".equals(paymentStatus)){
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.ACCEPTED);
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_ID, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/PAYID"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TRANSACTION_ID, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/TRANSACTIONID"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_CODE_CLIENT_SIDE, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/CRMTOKEN"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_BRAND, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/BRAND"));
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_BANK_REFERENCE, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/ACCEPTANCE")); 
					}else{
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED);
						methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_ERROR_MSG, getStatus(paymentResponse,"/root/NCERRORPLUS ")); 
					}
				}else{
					methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED);
					methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_ERROR_MSG, paymentResponse); 
				}
			}else{ 
				throw new
				BusinessException("Payment gateway response is null");
				 } 
*/
			String paymentResponse = "<root>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<STATUS>92</STATUS>";
			paymentResponse += "<PAYID>"+((int )(Math.random() * 100000 + 1))+"</PAYID>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<TRANSACTIONID>92</TRANSACTIONID>";
			paymentResponse += "<CRMTOKEN>clientSide</CRMTOKEN>"; 
			paymentResponse += "<BRAND>VISA</BRAND>";
			paymentResponse += "<ACCEPTENCE>bankRef</ACCEPTENCE>"; 
			paymentResponse += "</root>";
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_STATUS, PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING);
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_ID, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/PAYID"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_TRANSACTION_ID, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/TRANSACTIONID"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_CODE_CLIENT_SIDE, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/CRMTOKEN"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_PAYMENT_BRAND, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/BRAND"));
			methodContext.put(PaymentScript.RESULT_BANK_REFERENCE, getValue(paymentResponse,"/root/ACCEPTENCE"));			
		} catch (Exception e) {
			e.printStackTrace();
			throw new BusinessException(e.getMessage());
		}
	}	

	private String getValue(String sourceXML,String expression) throws XPathExpressionException{		
		InputSource iSource = new InputSource(new StringReader(sourceXML));
		XPathFactory xpathFactory = XPathFactory.newInstance();
		XPath xpath = xpathFactory.newXPath();		
		return xpath.evaluate(expression, iSource);			
	}
}]]></script>\r
               </script>\r
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript" description="Payment CallBack Script">\r
                  <type>JAVA</type>\r
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.smoove;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Script executed after a payment callBack (inbound request), if the payment is rejected , the invoice matching is removed and a new is created with a the new reject
 *         payment account operation
 *
 */

public class ${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript.class);
    private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
        Map<String, String> params = (Map<String, String>) methodContext.get("params");
        log.info("params:" + params);
        if (params.get("STATUS") == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Parameter STATUS is required");
        }
        if (params.get("PAYID") == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Parameter PAYID is required");
        }
        PaymentStatusEnum paymentStatus = PaymentStatusEnum.ACCEPTED;
        if (!"9".equals(params.get("STATUS"))) {
            paymentStatus = PaymentStatusEnum.REJECTED;
        }
        paymentService.paymentCallback(params.get("PAYID"), paymentStatus, params.get("NCERROR"), params.get("NCERROR"));
    }

}]]></script>\r
               </script>\r
                <paymentGateway code="customGateway" description="A customGateway">
               <type>CUSTOM</type>
               <paymentMethodType>CARD</paymentMethodType>
               <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_CustomGatewayPaymentScript</scriptInstanceCode>
              <applicationEL>#{customerAccount.code eq "${#TestSuite#CUST}"}</applicationEL>
               </paymentGateway>              
               <notification code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBack">\r
                  <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>\r
                  <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>\r
                  <elFilter>#{event.pathInfo.startsWith("/DEMO/custom_payment-callback?")}</elFilter>\r
                  <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.smoove.${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_PaymentCallBackScript</scriptInstanceCode>\r
                  <scriptParams>\r
                     <entry>\r
                        <key>params</key>\r
                        <value>#{event.getParameters()}</value>\r
                     </entry>\r
                  </scriptParams>\r
               </notification>\r
               <timerEntity code="Monthly" description="Monthly" hour="23" minute="59" second="59" year="*" month="*" dayOfMonth="Last" dayOfWeek="*"/>\r
               <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="PaymentCard_Job">\r
                  <jobCategory>ACCOUNT_RECEIVABLES</jobCategory>\r
                  <active>false</active>\r
                  <customFields>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_createAO">\r
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r
                     </customField>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_matchingAO">\r
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r
                     </customField>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit">
                        <stringValue>Credit</stringValue>
                     </customField>                     
                  </customFields>\r
               </jobInstance>\r
               <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="RefundCard_Job">
                  <jobCategory>ACCOUNT_RECEIVABLES</jobCategory>
                  <active>false</active>
                  <customFields>
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_createAO">
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>
                     </customField>
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_matchingAO">
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>
                     </customField>
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit">
                        <stringValue>Debit</stringValue>
                     </customField>                     
                  </customFields>
               </jobInstance>
               
            </moduleItems>\r
         </module>\r
      </ws:createOrUpdate>\r
   </soapenv:Body>\r
</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create module
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r
   <soapenv:Header/>\r
   <soapenv:Body>\r
      <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
      
         <module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_SlimpayModule" license="GPL" description="SlimPay module">\r
            <moduleItems>\r 
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Check payment status">
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.slimpay;

import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.PaymentResponseDto;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory;
import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.SlimpayGatewayPayment;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

/**
 *
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Check payment status on slimpay
 *
 *         Execute Context Variable :
 *         <li>record : PaymentHistory entity
 * 
 *
 */
public class CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);

    private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> context) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE context {}", context);
        PaymentHistory paymentHistory = (PaymentHistory) context.get("record");
        SlimpayGatewayPayment slimpayGatewayPayment = new SlimpayGatewayPayment();
        PaymentResponseDto paymentResponseDto = slimpayGatewayPayment.checkPayment(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentHistory.getPaymentMethodType());
        if (paymentResponseDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("checkPayment paymentResponse is null");
        }
        if (paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus() != PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING) {
            paymentService.paymentCallback(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorCode(),
                paymentResponseDto.getErrorMessage());
        }
    }
}
]]></script>
               </script>
               <script code="org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Create mandate callBack Script">
                  <type>JAVA</type>
                  <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.slimpay;

import java.util.Date;
import java.util.Map;

import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException;
import org.meveo.api.dto.account.CustomerAccountDto;
import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.MandatInfoDto;
import org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest;
import org.meveo.model.payments.CustomerAccount;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.CustomerAccountService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentMethodService;
import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.SlimpayGatewayPayment;
import org.meveo.service.script.Script;
import org.slf4j.Logger;
import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;

import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
import com.google.gson.JsonParser;



/**
 * 
 * @author anasseh
 *
 *         Script executed after a create mandate callBack (inbound request), if state is 'closed.completed' so a new directDebit paymentMethod will be added to the
 *         customerAccount( the subscriber).
 */

public class CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {

    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);
     private PaymentMethodService paymentMethodService = (PaymentMethodService) getServiceInterface("PaymentMethodService");
    private CustomerAccountService customerAccountService = (CustomerAccountService) getServiceInterface("CustomerAccountService");

    @Override
    public void execute(Map<String, Object> methodContext) throws BusinessException {
        log.debug("EXECUTE  methodContext {} ", methodContext);
        InboundRequest inboundRequest = (InboundRequest) methodContext.get("event");
        if (inboundRequest == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("inboundRequest is null");
        }
        log.debug("CreateMandateCallBback body " + inboundRequest.getBody());

        JsonParser parser = new JsonParser();
        JsonObject bodyCallBack = parser.parse(inboundRequest.getBody()).getAsJsonObject();
        String mandateState = bodyCallBack.get("state").getAsString();
        if (!"closed.completed".equals(mandateState)) {
            log.warn("EXECUTE  mandate not created, state:" + mandateState);
            return;
        }
        String mandateId = bodyCallBack.get("_links").getAsJsonObject().get("https://api.slimpay.net/alps#get-mandate").getAsJsonObject().get("href").getAsString();
        mandateId = mandateId.substring(mandateId.lastIndexOf('/') + 1);
        if (mandateId == null || mandateId.trim().length() == 0) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get mandate ID from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        String referenceOrder = bodyCallBack.get("reference").getAsString();
        log.debug("CreateMandateCallBback mandateId:{} referenceOrder:{} ", mandateId, referenceOrder);
        SlimpayGatewayPayment slimPayGW = new SlimpayGatewayPayment();
        CustomerAccountDto caDto = slimPayGW.getSubscriberFromOrder(referenceOrder);
        if (caDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get customerAccount code from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        CustomerAccount customerAccount = customerAccountService.findByCode(caDto.getCode());
        if (customerAccount == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("customerAccount with code:" + caDto.getCode() + " not exist.");
        }
        MandatInfoDto mandatInfoDto = slimPayGW.checkMandat(null, mandateId);
        if (mandatInfoDto == null) {
            throw new BusinessException("Cant get Mandate from slimPay sign madate Order callback.");
        }
        paymentMethodService.createMandateCallBack(customerAccount,mandatInfoDto);
    }
}
]]></script>
               </script>               \r
               <filter code="PaymentsWaitingCallbackFilter_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Payments waiting final status">

			    <filterConditions>
			      <primitiveFilterCondition>
                        <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType>
                        <fieldName>paymentGatewayCode</fieldName>
                        <operator>=</operator>
                        <operand>SLIMPAY_SEPA</operand>
                    </primitiveFilterCondition>
			      <nativeFilterCondition>
                        <filterConditionType>NATIVE</filterConditionType>
                        <jpql>asyncStatus is null</jpql>                        
                    </nativeFilterCondition>                    
			    </filterConditions>
			  </filterCondition>
			  <primarySelector>
			    <targetEntity>org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory</targetEntity>
			    <alias>o</alias>
			    <displayFields>
			      <field>externalPaymentId</field>				      
			    </displayFields>
			    <exportFields/>
			    <ignoreIfNotFoundForeignKeys/>

			  <secondarySelectors/>
		  </filter>]]></inputXml>
					</filter>
                 <notification code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_MandateCallBack">
                  <classNameFilter>org.meveo.model.notification.InboundRequest</classNameFilter>
                  <eventTypeFilter>INBOUND_REQ</eventTypeFilter>

                  <scriptInstanceCode>org.meveo.service.script.slimpay.CreateMandateCallBackScript_${#TestSuite#index}</scriptInstanceCode>
                  <scriptParams>

                        <key>event</key>
                        <value>#{event}</value>
                     </entry>
                  </scriptParams>
               </notification>

                  <jobCategory>ACCOUNT_RECEIVABLES</jobCategory>\r
                  <active>false</active>\r
                  <customFields>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_createAO">\r
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r
                     </customField>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_matchingAO">\r
                        <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r
                     </customField>\r
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit">
                        <stringValue>Credit</stringValue>
                     </customField>  
                     <customField code="PaymentJob_cardOrDD">
                        <stringValue>DIRECTDEBIT</stringValue>
                     </customField>                                         
                  </customFields>\r
               </jobInstance> 
			<jobInstance jobTemplate="FilteringJob" code="CheckPaymentStatusFilterJob" timerCode="Daily-midnight">
				<jobCategory>MEDIATION</jobCategory>
				<active>false</active>
				<customFields>
					<customField code="FilteringJob_recordVariableName">
						<stringValue>record</stringValue>
