</soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: Create module
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdate>\r
<module code="${#Project#entityPrefix}_${#TestSuite#index}_IngenicoModule" license="GPL" description="Ingenico module">\r <moduleItems>\r <script code="org.meveo.service.script.ingenico.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Check payment status"> <type>JAVA</type> <script><![CDATA[package org.meveo.service.script.ingenico;
import java.util.Map;
import org.meveo.admin.exception.BusinessException; import org.meveo.api.dto.payment.PaymentResponseDto; import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory; import org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentStatusEnum; import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.IngenicoGatewayPayment; import org.meveo.service.payments.impl.PaymentService; import org.meveo.service.script.Script; import org.slf4j.Logger; import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
/** * * @author anasseh * * Check payment status on Ingenico * * Execute Context Variable : * <li>record : PaymentHistory entity * * */ public class CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index} extends Script {
private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}.class);
private PaymentService paymentService = (PaymentService) getServiceInterface("PaymentService");
@Override public void execute(Map<String, Object> context) throws BusinessException { log.debug("EXECUTE context {}", context); PaymentHistory paymentHistory = (PaymentHistory) context.get("record"); IngenicoGatewayPayment ingenicoGatewayPayment = new IngenicoGatewayPayment(); PaymentResponseDto paymentResponseDto = ingenicoGatewayPayment.checkPayment(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentHistory.getPaymentMethodType()); if (paymentResponseDto == null) { throw new BusinessException("checkPayment paymentResponse is null"); } if (paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus() != PaymentStatusEnum.PENDING) { paymentService.paymentCallback(paymentHistory.getExternalPaymentId(), paymentResponseDto.getPaymentStatus(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorCode(), paymentResponseDto.getErrorMessage()); } } }
]]></script> </script> \r <filter code="PaymentsWaitingIngenicoCallbackFilter_${#TestSuite#index}" description="Payments waiting final status"> <shared>false</shared> <inputXml><![CDATA[<filter> <disabled>false</disabled> <appendGeneratedCode>false</appendGeneratedCode> <filterCondition class="andCompositeFilterCondition"> <filterConditionType>COMPOSITE_AND</filterConditionType> <filterConditions> <primitiveFilterCondition> <filterConditionType>PRIMITIVE</filterConditionType> <fieldName>paymentGatewayCode</fieldName> <operator>=</operator> <operand>INGENICO_OGONE_SEPA</operand> </primitiveFilterCondition> <nativeFilterCondition> <filterConditionType>NATIVE</filterConditionType> <jpql>asyncStatus is null</jpql> </nativeFilterCondition> </filterConditions> </filterCondition> <primarySelector> <targetEntity>org.meveo.model.payments.PaymentHistory</targetEntity> <alias>o</alias> <displayFields> <field>externalPaymentId</field> </displayFields> <exportFields/> <ignoreIfNotFoundForeignKeys/> </primarySelector> <secondarySelectors/> </filter>]]></inputXml> </filter> <jobInstance jobTemplate="PaymentJob" code="PaymentIngenicoSepa_Job">\r <jobCategory>ACCOUNT_RECEIVABLES</jobCategory>\r <active>false</active>\r <customFields>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_createAO">\r <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r </customField>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_matchingAO">\r <stringValue>YES</stringValue>\r </customField>\r <customField code="PaymentJob_creditOrDebit"> <stringValue>Credit</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="PaymentJob_cardOrDD"> <stringValue>DIRECTDEBIT</stringValue> </customField> </customFields>\r </jobInstance> <jobInstance jobTemplate="FilteringJob" code="CheckPaymentIngenicoStatusFilterJob" timerCode="Daily-midnight"> <jobCategory>MEDIATION</jobCategory> <active>false</active> <customFields> <customField code="FilteringJob_recordVariableName"> <stringValue>record</stringValue> </customField> <customField code="FilteringJob_script"> <entityReferenceValue classname="org.meveo.model.scripts.ScriptInstance" code="org.meveo.service.script.ingenico.CheckPaymentScript_${#TestSuite#index}" /> </customField> <customField code="FilteringJob_filter"> <entityReferenceValue classname="org.meveo.model.filter.Filter" code="PaymentsWaitingIngenicoCallbackFilter_${#TestSuite#index}" /> </customField> </customFields> </jobInstance> </moduleItems>\r </module>\r </ws:createOrUpdate>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_WO_AMOUNT_DAY
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_WO_AMOUNT_DAY" description="WalletOperation Amount per day"> <dimension1>null</dimension1> <dimension2>null</dimension2> <dimension3>null</dimension3> <dimension4>null</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery>select round(sum(wo.amount_without_tax),2) from billing_wallet_operation wo where provider_id = #{provider} and date_trunc('day', wo.operation_date) = date_trunc('day', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD')) group by date_trunc('day', wo.operation_date)</sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-09-30</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH" description="MRR (recurring Wallet Operations per month)"> <dimension1>null</dimension1> <dimension2>null</dimension2> <dimension3>null</dimension3> <dimension4>null</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery> select round(sum(wo.amount_without_tax),2) from billing_wallet_operation wo where provider_id = #{provider} and wo.end_date is not null and date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date) = date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD')) group by date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date) </sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-01-01</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_CHURN_SUB_PER_MONTH
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_CHURN_SUB_PER_MONTH" description="Subscription Churn per month"> <dimension1>subscriptions</dimension1> <dimension2>terminations</dimension2> <dimension3>null</dimension3> <dimension4>null</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery> with subscriptions as ( select count(s.id) as count from billing_subscription s where date_trunc('month', s.subscription_date) = date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD')) ), terminations as ( select count(s.id) as count from billing_subscription s where date_trunc('month', s.termination_date) = date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD')) ) select s.count-t.count as trend, s.count as subscriptions, t.count as terminations from subscriptions s, terminations t </sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-01-01</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_ORDER_BY_STATUS
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_ORDERS_BY_STATUS" description="Order by status"> <dimension1>pending</dimension1> <dimension2>validated</dimension2> <dimension3>cancelled</dimension3> <dimension4>null</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery> with value as (select count(o.id) from ord_order o where status in ('IN_CREATION')), pending as (select count(o.id) from ord_order o where status in ('ACKNOWLEDGED','IN_PROGRESS','PENDING','PARTIAL','HELD')), validated as (select count(o.id) from ord_order o where status in ('COMPLETED')), cancelled as (select count(o.id) from ord_order o where status in ('REJECTED','FAILED','CANCELLED')) select value.count as value, pending.count as pending, validated.count as validated, cancelled.count as cancelled from value, pending, validated, cancelled ; </sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>DAILY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-12-01</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH_PER_OFFER
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH_PER_OFFER" description="MRR per offer (recurring Wallet Operations per month)"> <dimension1>offer1</dimension1> <dimension2>offer2</dimension2> <dimension3>offer3</dimension3> <dimension4>offer4</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery> with mrr as ( select wo.offer_code, round(sum(wo.amount_without_tax),2) as value from billing_wallet_operation wo where wo.end_date is not null and date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date) = date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD')) group by wo.offer_code, date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date) ) select coalesce((select sum(value) from mrr where offer_code not in ('${#TestSuite#offer1}','${#TestSuite#offer2}','${#TestSuite#offer3}','${#TestSuite#offer4}')),0) as others, coalesce((select sum(value) from mrr where offer_code='${#TestSuite#offer1}'),0) as offer1, coalesce((select sum(value) from mrr where offer_code='${#TestSuite#offer2}'),0) as offer2, coalesce((select sum(value) from mrr where offer_code='${#TestSuite#offer3}'),0) as offer3, coalesce((select sum(value) from mrr where offer_code='${#TestSuite#offer4}'),0) as offer4 </sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-01-01</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH_SUBS
con:request.con:request:
<soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <ws:createMeasurableQuantity> <measurableQuantity code="MQ_MRR_REC_PER_MONTH_SUBS" description="MRR per Subscription Status (recurring Wallet Operations per month)"> <dimension1>regular</dimension1> <dimension2>new</dimension2> <dimension3>upsell</dimension3> <dimension4>cancelled</dimension4> <editable>false</editable> <additive>false</additive> <sqlQuery> select currmonth.regular + currmonth.new + currmonth.upsell + currmonth.cancelled as curr_total, currmonth.regular as curr_regular, currmonth.new as curr_new, currmonth.upsell as curr_upsell, currmonth.cancelled as curr_cancelled
from ( with a as ( SELECT round(sum(wo.amount_without_tax),2) as value , date_trunc('month', coalesce(ua.subscription_date, date '2000-01-01')) as ua_creation_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(s.subscription_date, date '2000-01-01')) as su_subscription_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(s.termination_date, date '3000-01-01')) as su_termination_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(wo.operation_date, date '2000-01-01')) as wo_operation_month FROM billing_wallet_operation wo inner join billing_charge_instance ci on ci.id = wo.charge_instance_id inner join cat_recurring_charge_templ rc on rc.id = ci.charge_template_id inner join billing_subscription s on s.id = ci.subscription_id inner join billing_user_account ua on ua.id = s.user_account_id
WHERE date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date)=date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD') - interval '1 month') AND wo.end_date is not null and wo.operation_type='W' GROUP BY ua_creation_month, su_subscription_month, su_termination_month, wo_operation_month ) select coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a),0) as total, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month >= a.wo_operation_month) ),0) as regular, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month = a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.ua_creation_month = a.su_subscription_month)),0) as new, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month = a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.ua_creation_month != a.su_subscription_month)),0) as upsell, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_termination_month = a.wo_operation_month)),0) as cancelled ) as pastmonth, ( with a as ( SELECT round(sum(wo.amount_without_tax),2) as value , date_trunc('month', coalesce(ua.subscription_date, date '2000-01-01')) as ua_creation_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(s.subscription_date, date '2000-01-01')) as su_subscription_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(s.termination_date, date '3000-01-01')) as su_termination_month, date_trunc('month', coalesce(wo.operation_date, date '2000-01-01')) as wo_operation_month FROM billing_wallet_operation wo inner join billing_charge_instance ci on ci.id = wo.charge_instance_id inner join cat_recurring_charge_templ rc on rc.id = ci.charge_template_id inner join billing_subscription s on s.id = ci.subscription_id inner join billing_user_account ua on ua.id = s.user_account_id
WHERE date_trunc('month', wo.operation_date)=date_trunc('month', to_date('#{date}','YYYY-MM-DD') ) AND wo.end_date is not null and wo.operation_type='W' GROUP BY ua_creation_month, su_subscription_month, su_termination_month, wo_operation_month ) select coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a),0) as total, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month >= a.wo_operation_month)),0) as regular, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month = a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.ua_creation_month = a.su_subscription_month)),0) as new, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_subscription_month = a.wo_operation_month) and (a.su_termination_month != a.wo_operation_month) and (a.ua_creation_month != a.su_subscription_month)),0) as upsell, coalesce((select sum(a.value) from a where (a.su_termination_month = a.wo_operation_month)),0) as cancelled ) as currmonth </sqlQuery> <measurementPeriod>MONTHLY</measurementPeriod> <lastMeasureDate>2017-01-01</lastMeasureDate> </measurableQuantity> </ws:createMeasurableQuantity> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:request.name: create CF_OFFER_LABELS

con:request.name: Subscription
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ws="http://ws.api.meveo.org/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r <subscription code="${#TestCase#customer}" description="selector Subscription to offer Selector"> <userAccount>${#TestCase#customer}</userAccount> <offerTemplate>OF_${#Project#templateCode}_SELECTOR</offerTemplate> <subscriptionDate>2017-10-15</subscriptionDate> </subscription> </ws:createOrUpdateSubscription>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
